creditline: Gift of funds from Marla J. Kinney
description: colorful woodblock print with image of figure molding a blue pot on a potter's wheel; figure wears a pink shirt, burgundy bottoms, and is surrounded by blue and brown pots; gold brick gradated background
inscription: LLC, in margin, in pencil: Rosita | 1 of 10 | 1957 | LRC of sheet, in pencil: D {circled} | 123
signed: LRC in margin, in pencil: Mabel a. Hewit
title: Rosita
